message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a compromise that I believe is fair, considering the product's uniqueness and worth.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can we meet in the middle again?
